title: can Ekko ult even if he dies for a second chance?
body: If he can activate it before 4 seconds, can he come back from the dead?

replies.body: In my matches I have ulted after taking sustained dmg, ignite, poison, etc. and upon dying so close to the time frame he just comes back to life. I come back with the damage still hitting and then die. He does the death animation and pops back ult to fight. I don't know exactly how it works but it's happened a few times. It didn't give me a death and was kinda like a GA.
Nope. Once you're in gray, you're not gonna be ok.

No, once you're dead the only way you can come alive again is to have something that explicitly says that you can be revived, and even then you respawn back at base plate. 

As far as I know, the only way to revive yourself _**after dying**_ is with the {{item:3345}}Soul Anchor trinket that is only available on The Crystal Scar map. There used to be a summoner spell called Revive, but that got removed a couple of patches ago.

> and even then you respawn back at base plate. 

GA and Zilean ult spawn you at base? >.>

You don't actually die when you get "revived" by GA or Zilean ult. Upon taking damage that would kill you, you go into stasis while you "revive" then you get more health after the stasis. Never once do you see the grey screen.
no, you have to wait til you start to lose a fight or are almost dead to ult. Unless you are using it for the damage.
I didn't think so, but funny if he could.
